subject: Mr. Richard Benard
body:
Mr. Richard Benard
From (UNITED NATIONS).
http: // www. un.org/sg
THE SECURITY OF YOUR FUNDS WAS THE REASON BEHIND THE CREATION OF THE
UNITED NATIONS BOX ONLINE BANKING FOR YOUR SECURE AND EASY TRANSFER OF
FUNDS
The U.S.A Government World Bank I.M.F And United Nations Organization,
this is to inform you of your long overdue Payment outstanding in our
records.
 We saw your name in the Central Computer among a list of
unpaid inheritance claims individuals and have to update your
information through this email contact for immediate confirmation.
Your name appeared among the beneficiaries who will receive a
part-payment of the sum of $34.7Million USD, Credited to safe un box
Online Bank that was set up for you in World Bank and it has been
approved already.
Be informed that all documents  in regards to your claims with our
bank have been confirmed, as directed by the International Monetary
Fund and the UNITED NATIONS. The approved sum is $34.7mIllion USD,
which 
I've already given you the online bank account customer link to
confirm the statement of account as soon as you meet the requirement
for online deposit
. A SAFE UNITED BOX ONLINE BANKING was created for
the safe transfer of funds or ATM CARD between the UN and approved
beneficiaries,
 
Our online account customer link will lead you through to check your
account balance by using your online account login access information
which will be sent to you  after you have met up with the payment for
the IMF SORT CODE activation of your online account access
 . The
online customer link will enable online transfer from your online
account to any bank account of your choice nationwide without a stop
order or requesting any further payment once the IMF SORT CODE is
sorted out by you.
Alternatively an international ATM MASTER card can also be issued to
you which you can as well use for withdrawal of money from your online
bank account, as soon as the account online access for transfer is
activated. 
We are here to formally inform you that you will pay for
activation of the online customer link through the IMF SORT CODE, the
code will be generated by the IMF COMPENSATION APPROVAL DEPARTMENT and
the code will activate the transfer of all the funds from the online
bank to your personal bank account .
Contact our online bank head department
Contact Mike Kenneth with this Information Below:
Name. Mr Mike Kenneth
EMAIL: Bank email will be provided once you respond to this email
I will wait to hear from you.

subject: Re: Mr. Richard Benard
body:
Dear Mr. Richard Benard,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am pleased to hear that my name has appeared on the list of unpaid claims and that there is an approved sum waiting for me.

However, before proceeding further, I would like to clarify a few things:

1. Could you please provide more details about the "IMF SORT CODE" activation? What exactly does this entail and what are the associated costs?

2. You mentioned an online bank account has been set up for me in World Bank. Could you please provide more details about this account?

3. How can I ensure that this process is secure and legitimate? 

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jonathan

subject: Re: Mr. Richard Benard
body:
Hello how are you doing today Mr Jonathan hope all is well according to the
clarification which you asked for sorry to say this according to the
government New year schedule things has changed so I will advise you to
follow the procedure

1. The IMF SORT CODE is the be given to you by world bank agent in order
for you to be able to make a withdrawal from your online account it's just
like a confirmation code which the bank needs in order to verify that it's
you

2. Yes an online account was created for you and your fund was deposited in
there but due to some inconvenience things change so you will have to
create a new online account with your information by yourself then your
fund will be deposited there

3. This fund is legit and it's under the government control and
investigation in order to make sure that this fund get to you in addition
you still have the chance to change a method of fund receive in case you
don't like online account

You can still receive this fund in
Cash
ATM card
Cashier check
E.T.C

Waiting for you response
Kenneth

subject: Re: Mr. Richard Benard
body:
Dear Kenneth,

Thank you for your response. I understand that there have been changes due to the new year schedule. However, I would like to clarify a few things.

Firstly, could you please explain more about the IMF SORT CODE? How can I get in touch with the World Bank agent who will provide this code?

Secondly, regarding the online account, could you guide me through the process of creating a new one? What information do I need to provide and what are the steps involved?

Lastly, I appreciate your offer to change the method of receiving funds. At this point, I am considering all options. Could you please provide more details about each method - Cash, ATM card and Cashier's check?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jonathan

subject: Re: Mr. Richard Benard
body:
Hello Jonathan.

According to your response to my email I am the agent and your fund
supervisor to addition to your clarification

1. The IMF SORT CODE is an international code for central bank transparency
practices it's enable the government make an effective monitor if this fund
is been given or delivered to you. And this code is to be given to you by
your agent which is me after you finish the documents ðŸ“„ settlements

2.comes to the online account it's depends on your choice if I should send
you the link to create your online account or if you will allow me create
it for you then I can be able to tell the information I need to open
the account for you

3.like I told you before that everything depends on the method you choose
so if you can make a choice then I can tell you the process but this are
the important settlement you need before the fund is been released to the
agent that will delivered it to you

Cash delivery will cost you $400 for the barrister signing

ATM CARD delivery will cost you $250 for the barrister signing

Cashier check delivery will cost you $150  for barrister signing


Waiting for you response
Kenneth
